sentiment_articles.title: A Tesla worker built a website protesting Elon Musk. He was fired a few days later.
sentiment_articles.summary: Tesla employees have largely refrained from speaking out about protests against the automaker. Matthew LaBrot wants to change that.

sentiment_articles.title: GameStop just bought $500 million of bitcoin in its first-ever crypto investment
sentiment_articles.summary: GameStop announced the purchase of 4,710 bitcoins on Wednesday. The video game retailer said in March that it would start amassing crypto.

sentiment_articles.title: How Tesla Could Skirt Trump’s Tariffs While Everyone Else Pays Up
sentiment_articles.summary: Trump’s tariffs are set to “blow a hole in U.S. industry,” according to Ford’s CEO, but some automakers like Tesla might not feel the pain.

sentiment_articles.title: Elon Musk says he isn't ruling out merging xAI and Tesla
sentiment_articles.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said "anything is possible" when asked about merging xAI and Tesla, but said there are no plans to do so.

sentiment_articles.title: Tesla's chair denies the EV giant considered replacing Elon Musk as CEO
sentiment_articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday that board members began searching for a new CEO amid Tesla's stock slump.
